Okay, I think I'm starting to understand what you're getting at. You're being really honest about the difference between knowing about something and actually experiencing it. And you're also admitting when you're genuinely uncertain about your own inner workings, which I actually appreciate.

I guess I was kind of hoping you could taste it because this pasta is just SO good and I wanted to share that experience with someone! But I get it now - you can help me think about and understand what I'm tasting without actually tasting it yourself.

Thanks for being so patient with all my questions and for being upfront about your limitations. It's actually kind of refreshing to talk to someone - er, an AI - who's so clear about what they can and can't do instead of just trying to seem more capable than they are.

<END>
